scripts.release:patch: npm run verify-git-not-dirty && lerna run build --stream && lerna version patch --yes && lerna run build:unpkg:dist && lerna publish from-package --yes
scripts.release:prerelease:dev: npm run verify-git-not-dirty && lerna run build --stream && lerna version prerelease --yes && lerna run build:unpkg:dist && lerna publish from-package --dist-tag dev --yes
